5901.short_description: Content posted contains text not allowed
5901.long_description: The post you have been trying to submit contains invalid words or text.
5901.long_solution: Edit your post. Make sure you are following [Juxt Code of Conduct](https://forum.pretendo.network/t/juxtaposition-code-of-conduct/8407) before submitting. Attempting to bypass the filter is considered a violation of Juxt Code of Conduct Rule 7 and can result in actions taken by the moderators.
